page.title: 07DAILY LIFE-PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: A day in the life of a child. I get up early, usually about 7.00 'clock. We go to school from 9.00 till 15.30 then I play outside with my friends until tea time. After tea I watch television until I go to bed at 20.00.On Saturday I get up at 0630 and watch the television till the shops open, at 0900, and I go{shopping}with Mummy. I go for my{piano lesson}at 1130 which finishes at 1200.My family often take me for a{pub lunch}and I spend the afternoon with my friends.After tea we sometimes go for a{drive}in our car. During the{school {holidays}we sometimes have friends who come to visit us from far away.They like to take us for{walks}and to visit the{beaches}during the Summer. At {Christmas time}we go away to spend the holiday with our Grandparents. All the family gets together and{celebrates.
